name: Myth or Reality: Mystery of the Lake Collector's Edition
name_original: Myth or Reality: Mystery of the Lake Collector's Edition
description:
Are you able to distinguish illusion from reality enough to debunk myths for everyone else? It’s time to find out, because you just received a letter: “Welcome to the Loch-Ness Hotel! It is an honor to host the author of such popular articles about mysterious incidents. We're glad that you accepted the invitation to visit and investigate the Loch Ness Monster mystery. Be careful, though, as it has recently been attacking tourists! Please note that the hotel is not responsible for your life and health! But we hope that our rooms, full of sweet trinkets and Scotland history, and nosy neighbors will be to your liking! It should be sunny with a chance of… flood?! Anyway… have a lovely time! Yours, Mr. and Mrs. Crossbury”. Are you intrigued? Then gather all the details and get to the bottom of the truth in this exciting Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

🧚‍♀️ Difficult choices!
Your new investigation programme includes: Fishing, camping and the MONSTER! Be ready to make some tough and vital moral choices as an expert in urban legends! It's up to you to uncover the truth behind the claims of a monster living in the waters of the Loch Ness Hotel!

🧚‍♀️ A variety of achievements!
According to some reports, a tourist was recently attacked on Loch Ness Lake. Could it be the monster? You've been invited to find out! Leading this mysterious investigation you will seek for hidden objects and solve tricky puzzles to unlock some peculiar achievements and highlight your success!

🧚‍♀️ Collectible items!
A new episode of the adventure is full of collector’s items and objects that the player needs to find in order to advance in the investigation! Don't forget to gather collectibles to delve deeper into the life of an urban legends explorer!

🧚‍♀️ Uncover the truth about Nessie!
Explore the hotel, the surrounding lake and other colorful locations not only in search of hidden objects, but also in search of answers! Is it true that the Loch Ness monster still hasn't been caught and only shows up when it's bored for fame?
